title: Get Married In The Chronology - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   System Administrator   Time Travel   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 洲是
description:
Time traveler Qiu Xiaochan receives a new task, travels through the eras, reverses the unfortunate luck of the original owner's marriage, and finds a man who really loves her for the rest of her life. In addition, the system detector will serve her wholeheartedly and detect the best single youth within a radius of tens of miles as the target of the strategy. 

1. The little widow in the 1970s (beautiful village girl & decentralized youth)

2. The shanty girl in the 1990s (dancer & paranoid prosecutor)

3. The little nanny in the 1980s (diligence orphans & disabled senior officials)

4. Age star of 90s (Miss Hong Kong & rich man)

5. Female spies in the 1930s (Glamorous spy & Mission Impossible Republican)

6. In the 1990s Xiao Qingmei (soft cute little cute & high cold learner)

7. Nine love before marriage in the zero years (rich girl & high-quality introverted phoenix man)

8. Battlefield love in the 1930s (chasing husband and wife crematorium for thousands of miles)

9. Rock love in the 1990s (female star & lead singer of the band)>
